overview_of_class: This course will provide an overview of research, theories, and methods in health psychology, including topics such as stress and coping, personality and health, social relationships and health, psychological factors implicated in specific diseases, and the biological systems altered by psychological states.
name: Overview of Health Psychology
title: WCAS PSYCH 428-0-20 Overview of Health Psychology

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will provide an overview of research, theories, and methods in health psychology, including topics such as stress and coping, personality and health, social relationships and health, psychological factors implicated in specific diseases, and the biological systems altered by psychological states.

subject: PSYCH
